entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
